articles.title: Germany may start COVID-19 vaccine programme in December: health minister - Reuters
articles.description: Germany could start administering shots of COVID-19 vaccines as soon as next month, Health Minister Jens Spahn was quoted as saying.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
